text: I had a pleasant visit to the clinic today.
summary: Patient reported pleasant experience at clinic

text: Wait times were low and the doctor seemed to care about the patient.
summary: Patient had a positive experience with low wait times and attentive doctor

text: The doctor was very helpful and attentive during my visit.
summary: Patient found the doctor helpful and attentive

text: I had an appointment with the doctor to discuss my headaches.
summary: Patient discussed headache concerns with doctor

text: The doctor's visit was quick; I only needed a prescription refill.
summary: Quick visit for prescription refill

text: I am here to see the pediatrician about my son's fever.
summary: Parent seeking pediatric care for child's fever

text: During my consultation, the doctor checked my blood pressure and heart rate.
summary: Vital signs checked during consultation

text: I described my symptoms of cough and fatigue to the physician.
summary: Patient reported cough and fatigue symptoms

text: The doctor diagnosed me with a minor infection and prescribed antibiotics.
summary: Minor infection diagnosed, antibiotics prescribed

text: I had to take a blood sample for testing at the lab.
summary: Blood sample taken for laboratory testing

text: The nurse gave me an injection during my clinic visit.
summary: Patient received injection during clinic visit

text: I received a referral from my GP to see a dermatologist.
summary: Patient referred to dermatology specialist

text: The doctor wants to keep me for overnight observation after my visit.
summary: Overnight observation required after visit

text: I need to schedule an appointment with my general practitioner soon.
summary: Patient needs to schedule GP appointment

text: My test results came back normal, which is a relief.
summary: Patient relieved by normal test results

text: The after-visit summary outlined my diagnosis and follow-up steps.
summary: Patient received diagnosis and follow-up instructions

text: I waited in the doctor's office for over an hour past my appointment time.
summary: Patient experienced excessive wait time past scheduled appointment

text: The doctor recommended an X-ray for my ankle injury.
summary: X-ray recommended for ankle injury

text: The doctor advised me to stop smoking for better health.
summary: Doctor advised smoking cessation

text: The billing department overcharged me and it took weeks to resolve.
summary: Patient experienced billing overcharge with slow resolution
